Name: Fairytale Figurine: Proof of Valor
Desc: A colorful toy flower model that can be placed on a "Good Shelf" for display.\nIn many stories, vivid red symbolizes courage and hope. Nothing is truly perfect."\nOr perhaps, such red flower models can be used to grant others the courage to execute their duties and continue moving forward.
